EmailTemplate.description: This email is sent out automatically when all the sandboxes for a playground have been created (based on the checkbox).
EmailTemplate.name: Playground - All Sandboxes created
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Playground Sandboxes have all be created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
All sandboxes for your playground ({!Playground__c.Name}) have been create successfully. You can now continue with the Playground Creation Wizard.
Kind regards,
The Copado Playground Team Copado Solutions S.L.
